languages.text: "Я унесу в сердце темную память об этом месте. Месте, где не звучит Его шепот. Где нет надежды".
languages.translation_comment:
Speaker Kibellah
Jae: "I still can't believe we've been saved! In the Dark City, I often prayed to the Exalted One, and now I'm going to need a lot of thrones to hold up my end of the bargain, but I have no regrets!"

languages.text: "I will carry in my heart the dark memory of that place. The place where His whisper does not sound. Where there is no hope."
languages.original_text: "Я унесу в сердце темную память об этом месте. Месте, где не звучит Его шепот. Где нет надежды".

traits.locale_text: "I will carry in my heart the dark memory of this place. The place where His whisper does not sound. Where there is no hope."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will carry in my heart the dark memory of that place. The place where His whisper does not sound. Where there is no hope."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Ich werde die dunkle Erinnerung an diesen Ort in meinem Herzen tragen. An den Ort, wo sein Flüstern nicht zu vernehmen ist. Wo es keine Hoffnung gibt."
languages.original_text: "I will carry in my heart the dark memory of that place. The place where His whisper does not sound. Where there is no hope."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde die dunkle Erinnerung an diesen Ort in meinem Herzen tragen. An den Ort, wo sein Flüstern nicht zu vernehmen ist. Wo es keine Hoffnung gibt."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « Je porterai dans mon cœur le noir souvenir de cet endroit. Cet abîme dénué de tout espoir, inaccessible à Ses murmures. »
languages.original_text: "I will carry in my heart the dark memory of that place. The place where His whisper does not sound. Where there is no hope."

traits.locale_text: « Je porterai dans mon cœur le noir souvenir de cet endroit. Cet abîme dénué de tout espoir, inaccessible à Ses murmures. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «Llevaré el recuerdo siniestro de ese lugar en mi corazón. Un lugar donde su susurro no se escucha. Donde no hay esperanza».
languages.original_text: "I will carry in my heart the dark memory of that place. The place where His whisper does not sound. Where there is no hope."

traits.locale_text: «Llevaré el recuerdo siniestro de ese lugar en mi corazón. Un lugar donde su susurro no se escucha. Donde no hay esperanza».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「心にはあの場所の暗い記憶を持ち続けるでしょう。彼の囁きが届かず、希望もないあの場所の」
languages.original_text: "I will carry in my heart the dark memory of that place. The place where His whisper does not sound. Where there is no hope."

traits.locale_text: 「心にはあの場所の暗い記憶を持ち続けるでしょう。彼の囁きが届かず、希望もないあの場所の」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “我要把那个地方的黑暗记忆留在心里，留在祂的耳语无法发声的地方，留在没有希望的地方。”
languages.original_text: "I will carry in my heart the dark memory of that place. The place where His whisper does not sound. Where there is no hope."

traits.locale_text: “我要把那个地方的黑暗记忆留在心里，留在祂的耳语无法发声的地方，留在没有希望的地方。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.original_text: "I will carry in my heart the dark memory of that place. The place where His whisper does not sound. Where there is no hope."
